# Slackers - Language Exchange Platform

## Project Overview

A bilingual (Koreanâ€“Japanese) language exchange and tutoring platform for university students.

## Tech Stack

- Next.js 14 (App Router)
- TypeScript
- Styled Components + Tailwind CSS + shadcn/ui
- Supabase (Auth + Database)
- Zustand (State Management)
- Vercel (Deployment)

## Design Theme

- Primary: #1E88E5 (blue)
- Secondary: #64B5F6 (light blue)
- Background: #F5F6FA
- Typography: Inter/Pretendard
- Rounded corners (rounded-2xl), smooth transitions

## Development Guidelines

- Use TypeScript strictly
- Follow ESLint + Prettier rules
- Use App Router conventions
- Prefer server components when possible
- Keep components small and reusable
